General_Description: '''Soldier to Shoulder''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''If you stand on the shoulder of [[Leonidas I of Sparta|Leonidas]], you will see he gazes toward the [[Menelaion|sanctuary]] dedicated to a mighty king of [[Sparta]] who ruled long ago. Start your journey southeast to [[Helot Hills]] and find me at the temple's altar.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
